doc.title: Salt Scrubbers
doc.plot: SALT SCRUBBERS is a harrowing narrative about three prostitutes on a visit to 'Eden's spring' a luxurious Fulham heath suite far from the sordid East End brothel where they work. Ayo, a hardened Nigerian sex slave and Jason, a rent boy, have become habitual visitors to 'Eden'. They feel its precincts and facilities allow them a safe haven and cleansing rituals that enable them to survive the ordeals of their profession. They want Galya, Ayo's co-enslaved prostitute, to share its blessing. On Galya's first visit to Eden, the safe haven is profaned when one of the three is propositioned by a john.
